Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw:


Demon Wulf heard Zardus' words about an upcoming battle and was quite 
interested.  An easy way to prove his value and get high in the ranks of this 
group.
"What is the name of your fa--" Demon Wulf stopped as he saw the animal 
(Rage) move towards a bot (DevilDuer), and saw numerous Alliance members open 
fire on the animal.

HIs still powered optics let loose a single crimson blast of optic energy 
toward's Rage's right side.


Flesh Ripper saw his brother fire and pulled the trigger on his rifle, firing 
a blue ice bolt at Rage's head.


Dark Claw saw his brethren fire, and raised his palm which still had the 
black ball of energy and threw it at Rage's hind legs. (It's going to have 
the effect of a grenade, only it's energy)
